snippet.title: Puzzling Places - Mars Desert Research Station (MDRS) Pack
snippet.description:
Introducing the Mars Desert Research Station (MDRS) Pack - the first DLC puzzle pack for Puzzling Places available to download this Thursday for 4.99$! https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3931148300302917/
 
The MDRS pack includes four puzzles:
- The Musk Observatory
- The RAM
- The Hab
- MDRS Exterior

Embark on a puzzle expedition to imagine what living on Mars could look like!
 
Each puzzle includes custom environment colors to really help puzzlers settle into the atmosphere. Through the spatial audio design, each puzzle includes special sound effects that come to life as players progress through the puzzles. 
 
As always, every puzzle is available to be played in 25, 50, 100, 200, and 400 pieces.
